name: Tomato-Bread Salad with Basil and Capers
author: USA WEEKEND Pam Anderson
summary: Capers lend this panzanella-style tomato salad the perfect salty bite!
ingredients: 5 cups 1/2-inch cubed French or Italian bread
1 ½ pounds tomatoes, stemmed and cut into medium dice
½ large red onion, cut into small dice
½ cup torn fresh basil leaves
1 pinch ground black pepper, to taste
directions: Adjust oven rack to center position and heat oven to 250 degrees
Place bread cubes on a cookie sheet with a rim; bake until bread is dried out, about 30 minutes, then set aside to cool
Meanwhile dice and salt the tomatoes in a medium bowl; stir in the garlic and let stand until juicy, about 30 minutes
Prepare remaining ingredients; add to tomatoes and toss
Adjust seasonings, including pepper to taste
